list.desc: Contributed to 3 projects to migrate legacy website to Angular tech-stack and achieved 85% of growth using server side rendering, and image optimization.

testimonial.title: Testimonial
testimonial.heading: What My Clients/Colleagues Say
testimonial.desc: Discover the impact of my work through the lens of client success stories

clientMessage.message: I had a pleasure working with Vikas, he is quick learner and helped in project stuff and features, and he has good technical knowledge and technical skills set. I am sure he will not disappoint at any time in any project.

Angular maestro with a flair for RxJS, Vikas is your go-to software virtuoso. A true team collaborator, he weaves code seamlessly, turning projects into masterpieces. From enhancing UI/UX to optimizing performance, Vikas blends skill and camaraderie, transforming challenges into triumphs. With a keen eye for detail and a knack for innovation, he brings a fresh perspective to every task. Elevate your development game with Vikas, where Angular expertise and collaborative spirit converge for exceptional results.

Highly recommend Vikas as a skilled Software Developer. I have seen his dedication to perfection and proficiency across a vivid set of coding languages, that make him an invaluable asset to any company he's working at.

I had the privilege of working closely with Vikas, a standout developer at Pepperfry. He consistently delivers high-quality solutions, showcasing deep technical expertise. Vikas also has a product mindset and goes beyond his role by contributing to the problem-solving process of the platform. His contributions were instrumental in the success of our product, highlighting his ability to tackle complex challenges.
